content.detailedDescription:
Sleeping, awoke to black shadow over me! thought i was dreaming! felt like someone holding me down and sitting on my neck then sharp pain like needles being inserted in my neck! hurt extreme now have 3 red needle marks on the back of my neck. kept shouting get off me let me up! to see the black shadow go away and a bright white light fading! 
   scared once again! also fowl smell like something burning! then noticed 4 black short creatures with large almond shaped eyes leaving thru the locked door!
content.summary: Felt like needle's being injected in my neck

content.detailedDescription: Walking my three shin tzu's westbound on quawpaw dr. heading downhill nearing house number 103 when i noticed an orb shaped object in the sky. it hovered approximately 60 degrees over the western sky horizon then appeared to get closer to small aircraft traveling northbound then suddenly made a sharp movement upwards. object accelerated over horizon heading northwest approaching another aircraft heading in opposite direction as the object then accelerated westbound over horizon where i lost sight of orb over treeline.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Object followed small aircraft then headed west to horizon

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my friend went to ellora caves, which is located in aurangabad for site seeing. at that point of time i was having my mobile phone model nokia 6681. i just started clicking the photos of the beautiful caves. i saw a huge ufo kind of object hovering above the cave and it was a bright sunny day and the time was around 1:40 pm gmt 5.30 ist on 26th november 2006.
i saw the huge object hovering in the sky and started clicking the photos of it and after clicking the photo, i have forgot about the photo and almost after 3-4 months my friend called me and told me to check the particular photo numbers and i had observed that there was a huge object which appeared at that time and in a 5-10 minutes i have clicked several photos in the same location but the object was observed only in one photo. you can also see my friend is in the photo and you can see the object without zooming the photo. you can see how massive object it was. the object vanished from the sky within fraction of milliseconds. if i compare the object with the commercial plane or bird it is impossible for them to directly vanish from the sky and they cannot be of that massive big size and shape.
content.summary: Ufo hovering upon ellora caves, aurangabad vanished within seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was fishing in preparation for a be a tournament @ lake mcclure in california.  i am always checking my surroundings, as well as the skies above me.  i noticed some unique clouds, and, a partial rainbow around the sun.  i took 4 quick shots with my camera, to make sure at least one of them was good.  i later posted the photo on face book.  while looking at the face book posting today, i noticed a blue sphere on the photo.  at first, i thought it was something on my screen, but it wasn't.  i checked the photos in my album.  photo 1.  just the son and the rainbow.  photo 2.  blue sphere appears at the 10 o'clock position.  photo 3.  blue sphere at the 2 o'clock position.  photo 4.  blue sphere is gone.  i discovered accidently, the presence of the object upon further examination of the prior days photos.
content.summary: Saw image on two separate photos i took of a rainbow around the sun. just saw it today.

content.detailedDescription:
Pulsating object in the afternoon at the sky close to town church. 

some years ago. today realized that i can report ufos.
content.summary: Pulsating object in the afternoon at the sky close to town church.

content.detailedDescription:
Shooting rabbits with an air rifle
using a stone wall as cover.Scoped rifle.
i had just walked past an area where the rabbits came out. .So i used the wall to wait out of site. i had sat there for about 10 minutes and then i peered back over the wall hopefully to see a rabbit and that's where i
saw the creature. still scares me even now..Approx 19 yrs ago
entity was stood there looking into field
all white. 6 ft high.Very lean.
slightly animal looking.Same color all over.
i was approx 40 m away.I could see it clearly. .It couldn't see me.I sloped off using the wall as cover.
at the time i did a lot of shooting.Had been shooting for 8 yrs. 
after this episode i never went again.
i also believe that i may have been visited on occasion at night and still struggle to sleep sometimes. 
i believe they pass on information.
content.summary: See notes below

content.detailedDescription: Le 5/5/2016, 20h45, mon fils de presque 10 ans remonte à toute vitesse les escaliers paniqué : "maman il y a un rond noir le ciel" . il était dehors en haut d'une planche etscutait le ciel et un disque noir est apparu... nous n'avons pas pensé d'abord à un ovni parce que nous habitons près d'une base aérienne ... mais cédric est habitué aux avions, aux ballons, triangles et drônes de la base t se précipite pour les voir... le disque est apparu de nord ouest en sud ouest d'abord à faible allure et puis a disparu à toute vitessse... vu son état de panique, nous avons demandé aux suricates mais surtout un militaire de la base ... et cédric a du reconnaitre dans un fichier ce qu'il avait vu ... aucun ne correspondait aux objets de la base... l'objet a été vu à profondeville et puis en franche comté ... c'est très difficile de dire si ce qu'il a vu ets ufo ou pas vu qu'on habite près d'une base... mais l'état de panique de mon fils me laisse pensé que ce n'était pas ordinaire... il parlait du champs de mais mais sans savoir me dire quoi ....La vitesse nous a dit le militaire laisse penser qu'il pourrait s"agit d'un ovni ou d'une technologie avancée ...
content.summary: Black ufo coming from north west  slowly then go away very fast

content.detailedDescription:
1.I was in my house filming for suspected paranormal activities with a cell phone camera. 
2. did not notice until video playback. 
3. it resembles a rabbit with a human face with mechanical movement. 
4.It looks angry and moves closer and further from you as it's staring at you. in parts of the video, you see lights appearing and a whitish gray clay looking thing in the background. looks like a big bulbous bald head. probably 3 or 4 ft tall. 
5. i've been anxious, depressed, angry. 
6. video cuts off.
content.summary: Beings in my house

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking back from work after being dropped off, since i work late nights, and i saw some flickering lights, so i took my phone out and recorded. i thought they were some lanterns or some floating drones. but i filmed some of it. time seemed to fly after quickly returning home since i realized what they could be.
 i left in a hurry because i was nervous when i saw that there appeared to be faces.
content.summary: Kept glowing and seemed to shapeshift frequently. i have footage, over 2 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
Location:fort mcmurray
i enjoy watching the night sky, and do so on a regular basis.One october night in 2015 i observed an un-identified object in the sky, it did not behave like any craft that i've ever heard of it hovered for a few minutes before descending in a zig-zag path. it was about 2 miles away and i could no longer observe it because there where multiple buildings obstructing my view. there were no helicopters in the location at the time and i am certain that the craft landed in the woods near my house. 5 months later much of the twon was destroyed in the largest wildfire to hit northern canada, i dont know if the two events are connected.
content.summary: Saw an un-identified object in the sky, it did not behave like any craft that ive ever heard of hovered for a few minutes before descending in a zig-zag path.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the sunset.  never did i notice the ufo's  through the lens.  i walked around approx. 10 feet in different directions to take several pictures and was surprised by the green glow in some of the pictures; as well as, the clear picture of ufo in other shots.  my first impression was a golf cart was out late and glowing.  enlarging the picture confirmed that it was not a golf cart.  i  called my husband to tell him i think i just witnessed an ufo.  i did not forward him the pictures i took.  he sent me a news video from a london paper stating the iss stopped live feed as six ufo's went by.  i looked at that video and they kooked just lime the ones i took a picture of.   i wasn't aware of where to send the pictures until now. hopefully i have done the right thing
content.summary: Sphere or dome muliple green lights. more than one

content.detailedDescription: Noticed a bright star-like light in sky over lake huron, viewing from bluepoint subdivision in plympton-wyoming, ontario and facing west towards (approximately) the location of lexington, mi usa. could not tell how far across the lake it was, but it seemed to be further to the usa side. watched for about 10 minutes through binoculars. with the naked eye it looked like a big star that had a red tint and seemed to be "twinkling". through binoculars i could see that it was an orb or roundish shaped light that was somewhat transparent and changed shape continually, like a blob that continually moved and shifted shape. looked sort of like a translucent jelly fish without the tentacles. around the outside was red, but not a continuous line of red, more like individual red spots, or lights. as it changed shape the red edge also changed with it and seemed to twinkle and fade in and out of sight a little bit. the movements were rapid and it did not stay in one shape but continually changed shape in a fluid manner. i watched from my deck,through binoculars, for about 10 minutes, then came inside and watched it through the window for a few more minutes. stopped to text a friend what was happening, looked back and it was gone, so i don't know how it departed.
content.summary: White/bright light constantly changing shape. translucent w/ red edges

content.detailedDescription: Standing in backyard, smoking cigarette, looking at sky right after sun set, approximately 7:10 pm central time in santa rosa beach florida.  saw a fluorescent aqua-neon green colored chevron shaped object flying very low at an incredibly fast speed.  observed for 3 solid seconds, enough to almost astonish, and watched its trajectory until i lost line of sight behind tall neighboring house.  waited a split second to recover my view but nothing was there. no disintegration, evaporation, or trail.  this object was definitely a solid shape, not a laser, and was traveling fast enough to break the sound barrier, but i heard no sonic boom.  i went back inside with a little crawly feeling in the spine and spoke to my parents about the sighting.  father is in aviation and having a lot of trouble explaining away what i saw.  pretty hard rational skeptic and found myself almost defensive about my observations to them.  never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: Fluorescent aqua-neon green chevron shape. flying low, incredibly fast, straight line, instant vanish

content.detailedDescription:
I was sleeping in a farm with my family when we saw it.
it wakes me up cause the light was very bright. 
i honestly didn't know what to think when i first saw it.
i was very sleepy during all the event. i lose sight of it cause i fell asleep.
content.summary: Really bright red-orange lights. it stays pulsating for an hour or more, and it happens every night

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 15 years ago, i was living on king st. with a woman and her two children. i had gone outside but, i don't remember why, it was getting dark.  i noticed a light between two trees that seemed like a shooting star but, there was a strange feeling i had about it.  anyway, that same night i had a dream where i was running down king st. away from the house but, at the end of the street, instead of turning, i went up into the sky, sort of like running up an invisible steep hill.  strange dream but, just a dream, right?  the next morning, i was awakened by my girlfriends children, in the front yard no less.  i have no idea how i got outside.  i've never sleep walked before and never have since that time.  i began going through changes starting as soon as they woke me.  the children seemed to understand what was happening because they spent a lot of time with me, they gave me some time to kind of "re-boot" for lack of a better term.  then they helped me to strengthen my body by getting me to jog after them on their bikes and other such things.  i don't know what happened that night but, and i am sincere in saying this, something either happened to me or i am not that me anymore.  sometimes i get this feeling that i'm somewhere else too.  i know it sounds like i'm crazy but, i'm not.  i need to be put under hypnosis but there's no one around here to go to.  if you guys can point me to a hypnotherapist that will not judge me, i really need to know what happened that night.  thank you.
content.summary: I awoke in the front yard, i've never sleep walked before or since

content.detailedDescription: Stepped out of my front door ready to ride to work on my pedalbike and saw a light going across the sky in a very slow way. watched for at least 3 minutes until it dissapeared in an instant.
content.summary: Slow moving star like ufo slow moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on a street in green valley, az.  i noticed a silvery white object in the sky to the north east (i was headed in that direction.  i observed it for about 30 seconds, it appeared to be stationary from my perspective.  i first thought it could be an airplane traveling away from me, but it wasn't diminishing in size, then i thought it might be a helicopter, but it didn't really look like the right shape.  the closest thing it resembled would possibly be a model drone, in which case it would have been much closer than it appeared to be.  my estimation would be that the object was 10-20 miles away.  the main reason i think this object may have been a real ufo was because it literally vanished into thin air as i was watching it.  it was clearly visible one second, then completely gone the next.  i am a skeptic, but i couldn't identify the object, it was clearly flying, or hovering in the sky, and it vanished in a clear blue sky.  i'm reporting this event, just in case anyone else might have observed this object, unfortunately, i have no video or pictures.  hopefully someone else might have seen it.
content.summary: Saw silvery white squarish object in sky for about 30 seconds while driving, then it vanished into thin air.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking my dogs for a walk as normal and entered a large park area. i heard in unusual jet sound, more of a howl as if a jet is reducing speedin the south west i spotted a typhoon eurofighter which i have never seen in before.  it turned and started to come towards me (north).  i started filming with my mobile phone as it was so unusual. 
the eurofighter was going very slow and was pitched up at a strange angle.
after it had passed behind some trees i stopped filming. 
however the howling sound continued.
i looked around and spotted a small commercial passangerjet that must have been passing over me directly as i was filming the eurofighter. 
the passanger jet had a van sized blimp on its right hand wingtip. 
i knew immediately that it was a ufo and not a plane. the jet was moving in a straight line and was moving very slowly. 
this bit of sky in on the landing path for birmingham airport and i am used to seeing them. 
this jet wasn't on a landing trajectory. 
the ufo matched the speed and maintained its position relative to the jet throughout my observation. 
i tried to film it but my screen was very dim as i had the sun behind me and i was a little over excited. 
i can't help but think that the eurofighter was a decoy as it drew my attention. 
had it not been there i'd have looked up earlier. the jet flew into the line of trees to the right of the ones the eurofighter flew behind.
i did feel odd.
the slowness of everything felt like time was slowing.
the howling sound was similar to a jet but not the same.
content.summary: Van size blimp trailing jet on wingtip with typhoon eurofighter escorting at distance.

content.detailedDescription: I was going home and wesaw a square object in thesky and we started, drifting to the ditchwhen  started getting a painful ring in my ear which has been happing scince the  welost sight of it because it flew off                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         t y s 0 n
content.summary: Driving by dark road then saw square ufo in air car started to drift in ditch it left and we all started talking about it

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
hi, i did see something in the sky from my house, while it was a rainy and cloudy day and the object i saw caught my eye because it was very bright.
it was daytime and at first i told myself that it was very odd that a plane or aircraft would fly so low and after 15-20 seconds it was moving very slowly then in a blink of an eye it went in the opposite direction very quick and again in the opposite direction it was then going.

i had never seen something in my life, ever, and never saw something like it again.

i'm 31 now and this event happened about 12-13 years ago. i never talked about it nor wrote about it.
i'm writting to you today because i just stumbled on your website and i've never frankly beleived in ufos but i've met someone a few months ago that told me that she saw something that really looks like what i saw. even then i didnt told her what i've seen. but since then i've been looking more and more into this phenonmenon.

i dont know what to do with this information but you seem to be the most profesionnal people to whom i can tell what happened and what i saw on that day.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright light hovering then in straight path going down right then going left then going right

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were standing on her back balcony looking up at the stars there seem to be more than usual i've seen ufo type stars before and wanted him to see one. he came outside and we saw oneswoosh down and take form of a donut shaped circle inside of another circle. if then descended and then ascended and took form of a helicopter like lights. when i slowed it down i saw shadows cast against neighbors garage
content.summary: Donut shaped ufo - casts shadow of figure

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were standing on her back balcony looking up at the stars there seem to be more than usual i've seen ufo type stars before and wanted him to see one. he came outside and we saw oneswoosh down and take form of a donut shaped circle inside of another circle. if then descended and then ascended and took form of a helicopter like lights. when i slowed it down i saw shadows cast against neighbors garage
content.summary: Donut shaped ufo - casts shadow of figure

content.detailedDescription: I was just standing their with a coffee in hand looking up. it was close to the top of a telegraph pole around 60 ft from me and it was about 450 ft round it took off after about aminuet and i litrially had shitty undies and had to go change them.
content.summary: Having a coffee out the back yard and and that's when i seen the ufo i couldn't move

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work being driven by a driver (on call doctor) when we spotted an unusually bright white light in the sky whilst leaving west berks community hospital (our base) in thatcham, uk. i'm not sure if it was still there or not as i was chatting to the driver and logging into the work mobile laptop etc., but as we continued up the a4 westerly direction it became very evident and looked quite odd.

i have seen venus before many times, and bright stars but this was quite unlike that as there were no other stars visible as there must have been cloud in the sky and this seemed much brighter than the venus i've observed this year. and this seemed a lot closer.

the driver thought it must be a flying vehicle of some sort but there were no blinking lights at all and it wasn't moving. he felt it may be a helicopter just stationary in the air with a search light on. i say this to emphasis that it at least *seemed* within our atmosphere and quite unusually bright for anything outside it.

as we drove west along the a4 to our first visit it remained in a fixed position in the sky. however suddenly it seemed to fade then disappear. just as we were commenting how strange this is, it reappeared again. it must have faded like this a couple of times more. we continued observing it down the a4 and it just hung there. we must have been observing it for about 15mins i guess, or more. then we got to our visit and after when i came out from the patient i'm not sure it was there anymore. either that or the shift got so busy we didn't pay any attention. 

i have taken still shots and two video clips with my smartphone
content.summary: Strange very bright light low in the sky on a slightly cloudy night with nothing else visible

content.detailedDescription: I was rolling around in my bed trying to sleep. i opened my window to let in some fresh air when i noticed a bright sphere in the sky. first i thought it was a airplane but the sole airport was in the opposite direction and there we no sounds associated with planes or helicopters. i grabbed my glasses off my study table to make sure of what the object was, when i glanced at it for a second time it started accelerating upwards at breakneck speed. it accelerated for 5 or so seconds before disappearing out of sight completely. i was in complete awe of what i had witnessed and checked the sky again for aircraft, then concluding that no aircraft were present except the mysterious object, i had guessed it to be an ufo. i lost sight of it when it was speeding upwards and the sight was blocked by my rain blocker at the top of my window. i re-positioned myself to get a better angle but it was gone by then.
content.summary: A bright sphere shaped object was floating above a nearby house when i saw it out of my window.

content.detailedDescription:
2 bright star like objects appeared near to the great bear constellation.  the lower 2 of the lights was as bright as venus and the upper as bright as jupiter (approx).  i observed them for approx 30 seconds,  they were completely static in the sky and did not move.  after approx 30 secs, the upper light disappeared followed by the lower object about 2 seconds later.   i am an amateur astronomer and know that there are not any astronomical objects of this magnitude in that part of the sky at this time of year.   if possible, could you let me know if anyone else has reported these lights or objects  -  as it would be great to get my sighting corroborated? 

i am certain that these objects were not conventional aircraft, shooting stars or meteors as they were completely still/static in the sky.

i have attached a diagram i created using a star map program i have,  and added the objects i saw in the location of the sky that i saw them  (upper and lower objects)
content.summary: 2 bright star like objects one above the other near constellation of the great bear

content.detailedDescription: I was at a baby shower when someone from the party came in from outside saying to come out and see the strange lights in the sky. i ran out the back (along with 20 other witnesses) to see what was going on. i witnessed what seemed to be large ships in the shape of diamonds fling about a mile above the house. they seemed like diamonds because of the glowing orbs at each joint of the diamond. however, i was wrong because the orbs then moved out of place into what i thought looked like a river of orbs. as they continued their path. they stopped in place and it was harder to tell them apart from the stars. i was really freaked out by the whole ordeal. i have seen planes, helicopters, satellites , in the night sky before and the orbs where completely different. i have never seen anything like this.
content.summary: A set of lights (40-50) moving in a group headed northbound.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was laying down on my utility trailer looking straight up observing the clouds
2. object came into view as i was looking toward the eastern sky
3. at first i thought it was a bird but it didn't have any wings. i then thought perhaps it was a diving bird until it passed right above me.
4. object was a small, black, delta shaped object flying overhead from e to w. it had a straight line path and as it passed above me, i noticed an elliptical shape protruding from the bottom. it was completely silent and very fast.
5.6. my feelings when i first noticed it was that i thought it was an interesting bird. a perigrine falcon came to mind until it was right over me. i said to myself, "that's not a bird, what the hell is that?". as i lost sight behind the tree, i turned over to see if i'd be able to see it coming out from the other side of tree and saw it for another second or two until it passed over the lake behind other trees. i then said to myself, "wow, i just saw a ufo".
content.summary: Cloud watching

content.detailedDescription: I was at my mother in laws house which is right in front of my house celebrating my wife's baby shower. when around 10 pm we looked at the sky due to seeing all the lights in the sky that looked like stars moving very close to each other. moving at different speeds. then they just dimed out into the sky after about 5- 10 mins from when i first saw them.
content.summary: A bunch of high hovering white lights , similar to stars , 45 + , fleet of white orbs

content.detailedDescription: We were at a party and then someone yelled, "look up what's that in the sky ?" i looked up and saw lots an lots of round lights all together in a group for like 5 or 8 min. then they one by one got in a straight line and started moving again, i would say like a house or two over. then stopped there for a good 15 to 20 mins and slowly stared to fade away.
content.summary: It looked liked a school of white round 20 or more lights
